attributes.action: Let children (and adults) repeat the school (college and university) year
attributes.additional_details:
We don’t want our children having longer days at school. We don’t want half terms to be taken up with more school when these times are used for family time etc.
Children find it hard enough doing 6 hours a day at school so why make their life harder and tougher. 
Repeat the school year for everyone as they are all in the same situation and missed out on the same amount of education.
attributes.background: Repeat the school year. We’ve only had 73 days in the last year of education.
